title: Showbusiness Isn’t For Everyone
itunes:title: Showbusiness Isn’t For Everyone
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am 50 year old devoted wife with a big problem. I have been married to a great man for 23 years and we have two kids in college. He is a great provider and we both have solid careers, but, he has always had a big dream. He wants to be a big Broadway actor. My husband wants badly to an actor, but, he has never been able to make it work........................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
